text: Mutumin da yake sanye da tufafin lilin, wanda yake a saman ruwan kogin, ya ɗaga hannun damansa da kuma na hagunsa sama, sai na ji yana rantsuwa da wannan da yake raye har abada, yana cewa, “Zai kasance na ɗan lokaci, lokuta da rabin lokaci.12.7 Ko kuwa shekara, shekara biyu da kuma rabi shekara Za a kammala waɗannan abubuwa, sa’ad da aka gama ragargaje ikon tsarkakan mutane.”
